short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automatically triggers Github dark mode based on system/OS preference

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Uses newer browser features to detect your operating systems dark/night mode and change the website accordingly. This project is open source so be sure to check out and contribute to the source code!
